'''TU75''' is the final version of {{edition|xbox 360}}. This update has an internal build date of April 9, 2019, and it was released on April 30, 2019.

== Changes ==

* Slower end credits{{Verify}}
* New texts on the home screen{{Verify}}
* Minor improvements to physics{{Verify}}

== Fixes ==

* Bugs fixed{{Verify}}
